edu.uml.cs.isense.api

Class API

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uml.cs.isense.api.API

  • public class API
extends java.lang.Object
    A class which allows Android applications to interface with the iSENSE website. Given a singleton instance of this class, functions can be called through an AsyncTask.
    Author:
    Nick Ver Voort, Jeremy Poulin, and Mike Stowell of the iSENSE Android-Development Team

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static API getInstance()
        Gets the one instance of the API class (instead of recreating a new one every time). Functions as a constructor if the current instance is null.
        Returns:
        current or new API

      • createSession

        public RPerson createSession(java.lang.String p_email,
                    java.lang.String p_password)
        Log in to iSENSE. Stores email and password variables so authenticated functions later will work
        Parameters:
        p_email - The email address of the user to log in as
        p_password - The password of the user to log in as

      • deleteSession

        public void deleteSession()
        Log out of iSENSE

      • getCurrentUser

        public RPerson getCurrentUser()

      • validateKey

        public boolean validateKey(int projectId,
                  java.lang.String conKey)
        Verifies whether a given contributor key will work for a project
        Parameters:
        projectId -
        conKey -
        Returns:
        True is the key is valid for that project, false if it is not

      • getProjects

        public java.util.ArrayList<RProject> getProjects(int page,
                                        int perPage,
                                        boolean descending,
                                        int sortOn,
                                        java.lang.String search)
        Retrieves multiple projects off of iSENSE.
        Parameters:
        page - Which page of results to start from. 1-indexed
        perPage - How many results to display per page
        descending - Whether to display the results in descending order (true) or ascending order (false)
        search - A string to search all projects for
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Project objects

      • getProject

        public RProject getProject(int projectId)
        Retrieves information about a single project on iSENSE
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project to retrieve
        Returns:
        A Project object or null if none is found

      • createProject

        public UploadInfo createProject(java.lang.String projectName,
                       java.util.ArrayList<RProjectField> fields)
        Creates a new project on iSENSE. The Field objects in the second parameter must have at a type and a name, and can optionally have a unit. This is an authenticated function.
        Parameters:
        projectName - The name of the new project to be created
        fields - An ArrayList of field objects that will become the fields on iSENSE.
        Returns:
        The ID of the created project

      • deleteProject

        public boolean deleteProject(int projectId)
        Deletes a project on iSENSE. Logged in user must have permission on the site to do this
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project on iSENSE to be deleted
        Returns:
        true if the deletion succeeds.

      • getProjectFields

        public java.util.ArrayList<RProjectField> getProjectFields(int projectId)
        Gets all of the fields associated with a project.
        Parameters:
        projectId - The unique ID of the project whose fields you want to see
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of ProjectField objects

      • getDataSet

        public RDataSet getDataSet(int dataSetId)
        Retrieve a data set from iSENSE, with it's data field filled in The internal data set will be converted to column-major format, to make it compatible with the uploadDataSet function
        Parameters:
        dataSetId - The unique ID of the data set to retrieve from iSENSE
        Returns:
        A DataSet object

      • getDataSets

        public java.util.ArrayList<RDataSet> getDataSets(int projectId)
        Gets all the data sets associated with a project The data sets returned by this function do not have their data field filled.
        Parameters:
        projectId - The project ID whose data sets you want
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Data Set objects, with their data fields left null

      • uploadDataSet

        public UploadInfo uploadDataSet(int projectId,
                       org.json.JSONObject data,
                       java.lang.String datasetName)
        Upload a dataset to iSENSE while logged in
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project to upload data to
        data - The data to be uploaded. Must be in column-major format to upload correctly
        datasetName - The name of the dataset
        Returns:
        The integer ID of the newly uploaded dataset, or -1 if upload fails

      • uploadDataSet

        public UploadInfo uploadDataSet(int projectId,
                       org.json.JSONObject data,
                       java.lang.String dataName,
                       java.lang.String conKey,
                       java.lang.String conName)
        Upload a dataset to iSENSE with a contributor key
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the project to upload data to
        data - The data to be uploaded. Must be in column-major format to upload correctly
        dataName - The Dataset name
        conKey - The Contributor Key
        conName - The Contributor name
        Returns:
        The integer ID of the newly uploaded dataset, or -1 if upload fails

      • appendDataSetData

        public UploadInfo appendDataSetData(int dataSetId,
                           org.json.JSONObject newData)
        Append new rows of data to the end of an existing data set ** This currently works for horrible reasons regarding how the website handles edit data sets ** Will fix hopefully --J
        Parameters:
        dataSetId - The ID of the data set to append to
        newData - The new data to append
        Returns:
        success or failure

      • createKey

        public UploadInfo createKey(java.lang.String project,
                   java.lang.String keyname,
                   java.lang.String key)

      • uploadMedia

        public UploadInfo uploadMedia(int dataId,
                     java.io.File mediaToUpload,
                     API.TargetType ttype)
        Uploads a file to the media section of a project while logged in
        Parameters:
        dataId - The ID of the thing you're uploading to
        mediaToUpload - The file to upload
        ttype - The type of the target (project or dataset)
        Returns:
        The media object ID for the media uploaded or -1 if upload fails

      • uploadMedia

        public UploadInfo uploadMedia(int projectId,
                     java.io.File mediaToUpload,
                     API.TargetType ttype,
                     java.lang.String conKey,
                     java.lang.String conName)
        Uploads a file to the media section of a project with a contributor key
        Parameters:
        projectId - The ID of the thing you're uploading to
        mediaToUpload - The file to upload
        ttype - The type of the target (project or dataset)
        conKey - The contributor key
        conName - The contributor name
        Returns:
        The media object ID for the media uploaded or -1 if upload fails

      • useDev

        public void useDev(boolean use)
        Switched the API instance between using the public iSENSE and the developer iSENSE
        Parameters:
        use - Whether or not to use the developer iSENSE

      • isLive

        public boolean isLive()
        Returns whether or not the API is using dev mode.
        Returns:
        True if the API is using the development website, false otherwise.

      • setBaseUrl

        public void setBaseUrl(java.lang.String newUrl)
        Directly set the base URL, rather than using the dev or production URLs
        Parameters:
        newUrl - The URL to use as a base

      • rowsToCols

        public org.json.JSONObject rowsToCols(org.json.JSONObject original)
        Reformats a row-major JSONObject into a column-major one
        Parameters:
        original - The row-major formatted JSONObject
        Returns:
        A column-major reformatted version of the original JSONObject

      • getVersion

        public java.lang.String getVersion()
        Gets the current API version
        Returns:
        API version in MAJOR.MINOR format
